comments_since_last_sample.body: Will you do a ssl Tournament this season

Good idea! If you need inspiration for next year:
1) Every time they demo you they get a penalty (scary sound, ghost car following them around, etc)
2) The reaper slowly starts following them around, to escape hide behind the bars
3) Play around with sound effects. Nothing scares people more than a sound which appears a few milliseconds earlier than expected xD
This wasn’t scary if it was an acc jumpscare it would have been way better
